answers.answer: My mom had it when pregnant with me. She went for her 38 week appt and they sent her to the hospital to induce her right away because of preeclampsia.
I had it... But had no clue until I went to the hospital due to other reasons but They immediately rushed me to l&d and started inducing me..

I had preeclampsia with my first pregnancy. It went undetected a long time. Went in to labor and delivery to get my cervix checked and my bp was 198/131. They rushed me to the children's hospital. My bp was too high that they wouldn't allow me to push my son out. I had him by emergency c section at 35weeks.Im 23weeks with my second Im already showing signs that i will develop preeclampsia again.

I had it with my first pregnancy and was put on bed rest then I went in for a non stress test and was told I was going to be induced the next day. I had vey high blood pressure saw little sparkles and would get bad headaches a lot. My amniotic fluids were low too. This pregnancy I was put on extra folic acid which is supposed to reduce the chances ofbhaving it.

They are worried I may get it with this one. I have some swelling (but I've lost weight) constant headaches and littke black floaters in my eyesight. My blood pressure is normally 120s/60s  today it was 150/84.... Hey said they are going to watch me and see what happens

How far along were you guys?? I'm 33 almost 34 I went to my family doctor for an ear infection and bp was high. She did a urine test and I had +1 protein... Ob wanted me in the next day .. my blood pressure was down at the ob app. And I was still +1 for protein so they did a blood test and am currently doing a 24 hr urine test..
I had it with my first pregnancy...diagnosed at 37 weeks and they induced a day after being admitted to the hospital.
